meanings.definition: The state of being below normal in intelligence or development.
meanings.sent1: The subnormality of his cognitive abilities made it challenging for him to learn new things.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the child with a subnormality in his intellectual development.
meanings.sent3: Despite his subnormality in intelligence, he had a great sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: Her subnormality in cognitive skills was like trying to navigate a maze with no map.
meanings.sent5: The subnormality of his mental capacity was evident in his struggles with basic math problems.

meanings.definition: A condition or characteristic that is below the average or usual level.
meanings.sent1: The subnormality of her height made her stand out among her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The poor quality of the product was a clear subnormality compared to others on the market.
meanings.sent3: His subnormality in speed was evident when he lost the race to a turtle.
meanings.sent4: The subnormality of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over their heads.
meanings.sent5: The subnormality of the weather made it feel like winter in the middle of summer.
